tool_description: Detects anomalous behavior in container metrics using statistical analysis and machine learning models, comparing current values against established baselines.

current_values.description: Current metric values to check for anomalies

baseline_value.description: Baseline reference value from Performance Baseline Calculator

detection_method.description: Anomaly detection method: threshold, statistical, isolation_forest, lstm

error_messages: Empty current values: Provide non-empty array of current metric values.
Invalid bounds: upper_bound must be greater than lower_bound and baseline_value should be between bounds.
Invalid detection method: Use one of [threshold, statistical, isolation_forest, lstm].
Invalid sensitivity: Use one of [low, medium, high].
Detection failed: Anomaly detection algorithm failed due to data quality issues.
usage: Provide current_values and baseline bounds from Performance Baseline Calculator, optionally set detection_method and sensitivity for anomaly detection.

anomalies_detected.description: Number of anomalies detected in current values

anomaly_indices.description: Indices of anomalous values in the input array

anomaly_scores.description: Anomaly scores for each detected anomaly

overall_anomaly_level.description: Overall anomaly level: none, low, medium, high, critical
